title: University of the Sunshine Coast (QLD)
body: Need 3 more players, preferably Gold or higher.  Always keen for a good time and a couple wins.

replies.body: yo you guys still play? I seen the post for the uni championships is this the team?

I'm keen as well :) s3 support and climbing

Edit: I'll try for gold next week so I can count :D
Hey bruh we're making a team anyways, do accept my add. You're the last member till we get 5. c: {{champion:103}}
I'm keen to join as well. Plat 4 currently.
Soz I forgot to check, sent you one as well.{{champion:44}}

Hey maaaaaze, 

I would certainly consider joining the team if we can get the numbers. I'm Plat 3 atm.
